name: Cost (GracefulDecay)
description:
Cost, By Hanford Lemoore / Graceful Decay.  

Play time: ~5 minutes.

Our first Bitsy game, for Bitsy's YOU CANT HAVE IT ALL jam.  

Runs in a browser, click to start it and use cursor keys / WASD to move. Space bar to step through text.  Walk towards the blinky + symbols and enjoy the story.  No clue how it works on mobile.

For more info on the making of this game, check out this post.

Brought to you by the people who brought you Maquette.
